results.title: Bitcoin Leverage Heats Up as Traders Bet on Price Rebound
results.description: Bitcoin's futures basis has widened amid retail dip buying surges, but one expert warns the setup may end in an "over-leveraged shakeout."

results.title: Strategy to equitize convertible debt over 3-6 years: Saylor
results.description: The world’s largest DAT plans to convert $6 billion in bond debt to equity, claiming that it could survive an 88% Bitcoin crash.

results.title: Hollywood’s AI Crackdown Opens Door for Copyright Detection Startups
results.description: Studios are escalating pressure on AI developers, as new tools aim to document whether generative models are trained on copyrighted material.

results.title: Grayscale seeks to convert Aave trust into ETF on NYSE Arca
results.description: Grayscale joins Bitwise in filing to launch a standalone Aave product in the US, betting that Wall Street has retained its appetite for altcoins.

results.title: TradFi giant Apollo enters crypto lending  arena via Morpho deal
results.description: The $940 billion asset manager will collaborate on DeFi lending infrastructure and could acquire up to 90 million MORPHO tokens.

results.title: Solution worse than problem? Adam Back opposes BIP-110 Ordinals fix
results.description: Blockstream’s Adam Back said BIP-110 could be used to freeze user funds, but the proposal’s creator argues that safeguards are in place to prevent that.

results.title: CZ says lack of onchain privacy is holding back crypto payments
results.description: Transparency, which is a hallmark feature of most cryptocurrencies, is likely one of the biggest hurdles to mass adoption, the Binance founder said.

results.title: OpenClaw Creator Gets Big Offers to Acquire AI Sensation—Will It Stay Open Source?
results.description: Peter Steinberger's open-source AI agent OpenClaw hit 180,000 GitHub stars and spawned MoltBook chaos. Now Meta and OpenAI want to buy it, but he's determined to keep it free.

results.title: Michael Saylor signals another Bitcoin buy amid market rout
results.description: The purchase will mark week 12 of consecutive buys by Strategy, which continues accumulating BTC despite a sharp decline in the company's stock price.

results.title: Her Divorce Was Ugly. Crypto Became a Lifeline
results.description: A mother in Texas said that crypto helped her overcome financial abuse.

results.title: Bitcoin Takes Step Towards Quantum Fix as Experts Diverge on Urgency of Threat
results.description: Bitcoin developers lay the groundwork for post-quantum upgrades, but experts vary on whether the threat is years or decades away.

results.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
results.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

results.title: Study suggests WLFI could act as an ‘early warning signal’ in crypto
results.description: Trump-linked WLFI dropped more than five hours before a $6.9 billion crypto liquidation event, raising questions about early market stress signals.

results.title: Mirae Asset agrees to buy 92% stake in Korean exchange Korbit for $93M
results.description: Mirae Asset Consulting agreed to acquire a 92.06% controlling stake in South Korean crypto exchange Korbit for about $93 million in cash.

results.title: Senators ask Bessent to probe $500M UAE stake in Trump-linked WLFI
results.description: Elizabeth Warren and Andy Kim call on Treasury’s Scott Bessent to review a UAE-backed investment in the Trump-linked crypto firm over national security concerns.

results.title: Bitcoin Price Reclaims $70,000 After Deep February Slide
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Bitcoin Price Reclaims $70,000 After Deep February Slide After a rough sell-off that dragged BTC near $60,000, the bitcoin price has rebounded above $70,000. This post Bitcoin Price Reclaims $70,000 After Deep February Slide first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Can Meme Coins Power a Senate Bid? Virginia’s Mark Moran Says Yes
results.description: Mark Moran is using a meme coin on Solana to elevate his U.S. Senate bid, rallying degens against a pro-crypto Democrat in Virginia.

results.title: Bitcoin Is Down Bad, But Hasn't Yet Hit Its 'Ultimate Bear Market Bottom': Analysts
results.description: Despite its 45% fall since its October peak, Bitcoin has not yet found its bear market bottom, according to a new report from CryptoQuant.

results.title: Publicly Traded Blockchain Lender Figure Confirms Customer Data Breach
results.description: Blockchain lender Figure said hackers accessed customer data after an employee was targeted in a social engineering attack.

results.title: Trump Media Files to Launch Truth Social-Branded Bitcoin, Ethereum, Cronos ETFs
results.description: Truth Social Funds applied for ETFs that would give investors exposure to crypto—one focused on Bitcoin and Ethereum, the other on Cronos.

results.title: How Silent.Link Solves SIM-Swap Risks and Roaming Hassles for Traveling Bitcoiners
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine How Silent.Link Solves SIM-Swap Risks and Roaming Hassles for Traveling Bitcoiners Silent.Link eliminates SIM-swap attacks via eSIM backup codes and automates seamless roaming across 160+ countries, bypassing censorship like China's Great Firewall. This post How Silent.Link Solves SIM-Swap Risks and Roaming Hassles for Traveling Bitcoiners first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Juan Galt.

results.title: Coinbase (COIN) Surges 18%, Strategy (MSTR) Jumps 10% as Crypto Stocks Jump
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Coinbase (COIN) Surges 18%, Strategy (MSTR) Jumps 10% as Crypto Stocks Jump Crypto-linked stocks jumped as Coinbase (COIN) surged 18% and Strategy (MSTR) rose 10%, fueled by a rebound in Bitcoin and renewed investor interest in digital-asset exposure. This post Coinbase (COIN) Surges 18%, Strategy (MSTR) Jumps 10% as Crypto Stocks Jump first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Clarity Act Passage Would 'Comfort' Markets Amid Bitcoin Volatility: Treasury Secretary Bessent
results.description: U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent suggested that the crypto market would be calmed by the passage of the Clarity Act.

results.title: White House Executive Director: Trillions Are Waiting To Enter Bitcoin And Crypto, Working Hard on Market Structure Bill
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine White House Executive Director: Trillions Are Waiting To Enter Bitcoin And Crypto, Working Hard on Market Structure Bill The White House executive director said trillions are poised to enter Bitcoin and crypto, emphasizing ongoing work on a market structure bill. results.title: Brazil Proposes National Bitcoin Reserve, Targets 1 Million BTC Over Five Years
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Brazil Proposes National Bitcoin Reserve, Targets 1 Million BTC Over Five Years Brazilian lawmakers have reintroduced a bill proposing the creation of a Strategic Sovereign Bitcoin Reserve (RESBit) to acquire one million Bitcoin over five years. This post Brazil Proposes National Bitcoin Reserve, Targets 1 Million BTC Over Five Years first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Lightning Labs Rolls Out AI Agent Tools to Help With Bitcoin Transactions on Lightning Network
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Lightning Labs Rolls Out AI Agent Tools to Help With Bitcoin Transactions on Lightning Network Lightning Labs released a new toolkit that enables AI agents to operate directly on the Bitcoin Lightning Network. results.title: U.S. Treasury: Congress Needs to Pass Crypto Legislation This Spring
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine U.S. Treasury: Congress Needs to Pass Crypto Legislation This Spring U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent is urging lawmakers to deliver crypto legislation to President Donald Trump’s desk for signature this spring. results.title: Binance France CEO Targeted in Failed Home Invasion Near Paris, Three Arrested
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Binance France CEO Targeted in Failed Home Invasion Near Paris, Three Arrested Binance France CEO David Prinçay was targeted in a failed home invasion near Paris on Feb. 12. French police arrested three suspects. This post Binance France CEO Targeted in Failed Home Invasion Near Paris, Three Arrested first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Thailand Moves to Cement Bitcoin and Digital Assets in Regulated Derivatives Market
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Thailand Moves to Cement Bitcoin and Digital Assets in Regulated Derivatives Market Thailand is moving to cement bitcoin and other digital assets as legitimate, regulated reference assets in its derivatives and capital markets. This post Thailand Moves to Cement Bitcoin and Digital Assets in Regulated Derivatives Market first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Strategy (MSTR) Accounted for 97.5% of Corporate Bitcoin Buying Last Month, Report Shows
